title: madebywan
description:
Heishi Bottle — Wheel thrown with brown stoneware clay, glazed matte black (interior) and gloss white (exterior). 85mm Diameter, 170mm Tall. Perfect for holding a small bunch of blooms or on its own as a sculptural art piece. Available through our online store ✨
